author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Thirty-Three! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

I'm a huge fan of early 90's style Apocalypses. Deep Star Six, HARDWARE. Tabletop games like VOR the Maelstrom, Video Games like Fallout 1/2 or the RPGs like Twilight 2000 or Red Dawn all give a grim future informed by the paranoia of the 80s. WORLD WAR APOCALYPSE sets us firmly in that gritty era of hopeless Post Apocalyse where warbands of Retrofuturistic fighters take to a hopeless end times to war with each other. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/524996/World-War-Apocalypse-10-Core-Rules-and-Art/?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 033 - WORLD WAR APOCALYPSE  by Grant Miller
